headline: Charles Schwab’s (SCHW) Financial Strength Makes It a Dividend Buy in August
summary: The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW) is included among the 10 Best Dividend Stocks to Buy in August. The Charles Schwab Corporation (NYSE:SCHW), an American multinational financial services company, is bouncing back from a challenging period with solid momentum, as its core fundamentals strengthen across the board. headline: Bullish Sentiment Rebounds Even as More Than Half of Traders Believe the Market is Over-Valued
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, July 30, 2025--Charles Schwab, a leader in investing and trading with $10.76 trillion in total client assets, today announced the findings of its Q3 2025 Trader Sentiment Survey which revealed a notable rebound in market optimism among traders. Bullishness has doubled since last quarter, with 57% of traders now expressing a positive market outlook – the highest level since the survey was established in 2022. At the same time, recession fears have steeply declined, with only 31%

content.title: Bullish Sentiment Rebounds Even as More Than Half of Traders Believe the Market is Over-Valued
content.summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, July 30, 2025--Charles Schwab, a leader in investing and trading with $10.76 trillion in total client assets, today announced the findings of its Q3 2025 Trader Sentiment Survey which revealed a notable rebound in market optimism among traders. Bullishness has doubled since last quarter, with 57% of traders now expressing a positive market outlook – the highest level since the survey was established in 2022.
